page.title: 13Silton & Kepwick CE School
page.content: Children up to the age of 11 are educated at Silton & Kepwick Church of England School in Nether Silton before moving to secondary school in Northallerton,7 miles away.The school was built in l875 by ancestors of a family still living in the village and it's catchment area covers the parishes of Kepwick,Nether Silton & Over Silton.It is run by the Head Teacher with the aid of a 15 hour part time assistant.A Clerical Assistant is employed for 3 hrs. per week as is a P.E. teacher.Music & Art are taught by specialists who work voluntarily.A lady from the village is Caretaker. There are at present only 11 pupils (6 juniors & 5 infants) of which 3 are due to leave shortly. The school is one large room which can be divided into 2 by a sliding partition.It is available for hire.
